channel.title: Cancer on xiaoni's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Cancer on xiaoni's blog

item.title: Loading new data on samples we already have in Xena
item.description:
Loading new data on samples we already have in Xena.

TCGA database is TCGA Prostate Cancer (PRAD);

Local data is from Cell Rep. PMID# 29617662

item.title: Local UCSC Xena Data Hub
item.description:
Load the private data to Local Xena Data Hub.

The Local Xena Browser is the same as the public browser, which shows same VISUALIZATION and TOOLS no matter where the data is located.

An Application example: Analysis of the total population of monocytes from patients with metastatic breast cancer (MBC), sepsis, or tuberculosis.

item.title: TissGDB: tissue-specific gene database in cancer
item.description: TissGDB is the tissue-specific gene annotation database in cancer, aiming to provide a resource or reference for cancer and the related disease studies in the context of tissue specificity.
